name: Grilled Steak with Vegetables
steps:
Season steaks with salt, pepper, and rosemary.
Let steaks rest at room temperature for 30 minutes.
Heat grill or pan to high heat.
Cook steaks for 4-5 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Let steaks rest for 5 minutes.
Toss vegetables with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Roast vegetables in oven at 400Â°F for 15 minutes.
Serve steak with roasted vegetables.
